title: Basic Home Care Guidance
content: For mild fever, ensure hydration, give paracetamol according to age/weight, and monitor for danger signs.

title: Expanded Programme on Immunization (EPI) schedule
content: BCG and OPV at birth, Pentavalent + OPV at 6, 10, 14 weeks, Measles at 9 and 15 months.

title: Antenatal Care Visits
content: Pregnant women should attend at least 4 antenatal visits, take iron/folate, and seek care for bleeding, severe headache, or swelling.

title: Sehat Card Plus
content: Government-supported insurance for low-income families. Placeholder CNIC 12345-xxxxxxx-x accepted during pilot enrollment.
